sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RECKONING or a Ship’s Reckoning, in navιga-tion, is that account whereby at any time it may be known where the ſhip is, and on what courſe or courſes ſſie is to ſteer, in order to gain her port ; and that ac-count taken from the log-board is called the dead reckoning. See Navigation.
